channel.title: Flashlight crashes game
channel.description: I reinstalled Black Mesa after a long while of having it (uninstalled it before to free up a bit of disk space) and when I tried using my flashlight in-game for the first time, as it was[/size] [b]very [/size][/b]dark in the area I was in, and it crashed my game. I relaunched the game and tried again; same conclusion. I even tried changing the flashlight button from its default "F" to something random like "X", and that made no difference. Is anyone else having this same issue? Any ideas on how to fix it? Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated.[/size]
